projects.title: Homecare Patient Scheduling Chrome Extension and WebApp
projects.description: developed a chrome extension and web app to gather patient data through reverse engineering api calls from a patient portal and store data in a postgresql database. utilized twilioâ€™s api to send texts to patients for scheduling and tracking responses.

projects.title: Post Labeling
projects.description: used natural language processing and machine learning concepts to read posts in a discussion forum and label the posts under a subset of given labels.

projects.title: PrizePicks Sports Gambling Bot
projects.description: scraped data off sports gambling websites to find inefficiencies in odds set by prizepicks and created valid sets of bets that are mathematically profitable over the long run, achieving a $400 profit after 2 weeks of use.

projects.title: SillyQL Database Query Language
projects.description: implemented a rudimentary database management and query language, working with hash tables and creating larger data structures through composition.

projects.title: Image Processing Seam Carving Algorithm
projects.description: developed a seam carving algorithm to resize an image with minimal stretching or compressing, performing context-aware resizing by determining the row or column of the image with the least weight and adjusting accordingly.

projects.title: Convex Hull
projects.description: created a closed shape using the shortest total set of connections possible for a given set of points, utilizing graham scan and jarvis march algorithm.

projects.title: UCS IASA Practice and Show Scheduler WebApp
projects.description: developed a web app with an intuitive signup form to allow members to sign up for dance sections, using mongodb to store and retrieve member information. implemented rest api with express and utilized the traveling salesman algorithm for optimal scheduling.

projects.title: Rock Paper Scissors Game
projects.description: completed a frontend mentor project involving a rock paper scissors game using vue.js. adhered to style guides for vue, css, html, and javascript, and conducted unit testing to ensure code quality.
